Is it possible this crack doesn't work under leopard?
The app crashes on launch...

For users with Leopard the crack will not work right away. If you open the terminal and type the following commands you will be able to run the app.

$ cd /usr/lib
$ sudo cp libcrypto.0.9.dylib libcrypto.0.9.dylib.old
$ sudo cp libssl.0.9.dylib libssl.0.9.dylib.old
$ sudo ln -sf libcrypto.0.9.7.dylib libcrypto.0.9.dylib
$ sudo ln -sf libssl.0.9.7.dylib libssl.0.9.dylib

When the app crashes if you click the "Report" button you will see that it is referencing the file libcrypto.0.9.dylib ... I guess Tiger used a different filename for the same library.

The crack works great for me now... hope you guys enjoy!
